SEARCH
Package com.app.persistence.repository.specification

Interface ProductSpecification

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProductSpecificationImpl
public interface ProductSpecification
Interface defining the contract for filtering ProductEntity objects.

Implementations of this interface should provide logic to apply dynamic filters to product queries, allowing filtering based on different criteria such as price range and category.

For example, a filter might specify a range of prices or a specific product category to narrow down search results.

Usage example:

ProductFilterSpecification filter = new ProductFilterSpecification( BigDecimal.valueOf(100), BigDecimal.valueOf(500), "Electronics" ); Specification<com.app.persistence.entity.ProductEntity> specification = productSpecification.dynamicFilter(filter);

    • dynamicFilter

      org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<ProductEntity> dynamicFilter(ProductFilterSpecification productFilterSpecification)
      Generates a Specification based on the provided filter criteria.
      Parameters:
      productFilterSpecification - the filter criteria (price range and category)
      Returns:
      a Specification that can be used in a query to filter ProductEntity objects
